metadataAttributes.Title: User Interface Design Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Design Better User Interfaces. Learn to create effective and usable interfaces for a range of products and devices.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Usability, User Interface Design (UI Design), Design Theory, User Interface, User Research, Heuristic Evaluation,
